body.name: MOUNTUP TV Wall Mount, Single Stud TV Mount Swivel Tilt Full Motion for Most 26-55 Inch Flat Screen/Curved TVs, Universal Articulating Wall Mount TV Bracket with Max VESA 400x400mm, Holds up to 60lbs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 5 mins
features: UNIVERSAL TV MOUNT - This TV bracket is designed for most 26-55 Inch LCD, LED, or Plasma flat/curved screens up to 60 lbs, with VESA patterns from 75x75mm to 400x400mm. Easy single stud installation on solid wood or concrete. NOTE: Not for alone drywall alone.

FULL MOTION TV WALL MOUNT - The wall mount TV bracket tilts TV up 5° and down 13°, swivels left and right 90° for the most comfortable viewing angle, extends 18.1” and retracts back 2.9” for flexible movement and space-saving. -/+3° post-installation for perfect TV leveling.

SAFETY AND STABILITY - The swivel TV wall mount features heavy-duty cold-formed steel construction and extending rod design. It holds your TV with the rod fully extended and super stable. Each mount has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family.

EASY SINGLE STUD INSTALLATION - Single TV mount design makes the installation a breeze. We provide all the necessary hardware, bubble level, and clear instructions for quick and easy installation in less than 20 minutes. NOTE: Don't mount on drywall alone.

FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE - Buy MOUNTUP TV wall mount with confidence! Our TV mount series are backed by 3-year protection. The customer support team is available to answer any questions within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lock TV in Place, Adjust as You Need

STEADY SINGLE STUD MOUNT TV wall mount MU0011 features heavy-duty cold-formed steel construction and extending rod design. It holds your TV with the rod fully extended and super stable. Each mount has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family. COMPATIBILITY This TV wall mount fits most 26-55 Inch LCD, LED, or Plasma flat/curved screens up to 60 lbs with VESA patterns from 75x75mm to 400x400mm. This wall mount is perfectly compatible with the following TV models(not limited): Toshiba 32LF221U19; TCL 28S305 32S305 32S325 32S327; SANSUI S32Z118; LG 24LH4830-PU 32LK540BPUA 22LJ4540 24LJ4540 28LJ4540; Insignia NS-32DF310NA; Samsung UN32N5300AFXZA; Scepter X328BV-SR etc. It also can be mounted on concrete or brick walls. Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed. Note: Not for alone drywall application. PACKAGE INCLUDES 1x TV mount, 1 x bubble level, 3 x velcro cable ties, 1x user manual, 1x mounting template, all standard mounting hardware. Note: Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Quality super sturdy worth the money look no further you will love how easy to fold in and out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wall Mount Bracket.
reviews.reviewText: A few weeks ago, my son gave me a 32" flat screen what he was tired of stepping over in his apartment. After lots of research and reviews, I settled on this wall mount for my garage. I cannot be happier. It comes with more hardware than needed depending on what size TV you have. The directions are easy to follow and it does not take long to assemble. I do not recommend hanging the tv yourself as the directions say, but I did anyhow. My tv weighs 31.7 lbs. I had to stand on my work bench in the garage to mount the bracket and tv and it went well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value - everything you’d expect and more
reviews.reviewText: There are many other full motion TV mounts that do the same and cost more than 3x as much... why pay more?You’ll need: a stud finder, a pencil to mark the borders of the stud and where you want to drill the holes, a drill with a (5/17th - I think) drill bit to pre drill the holes for the mounting stud screws, a socket socket wrench to drive in the stud screws - or if you have a ratcheting socket wrench or socket driver then even better.Was surprised that despite the low cost, it even came quipped with several different sizes of threaded bolts to accommodate most TVs, a small wrench to dial in the leveling bolts, an extra usb cable, a small level, and even a nice Velcro strap for cable management. Took me about 20 min to install. I’m not what you would call a craftsman, by any stretch, nor did I try to set any time record. This was me, a layperson equipped with the neccessary tools, reading the simple directions, and being methodical in my approach. Easy peasy.I didn’t receive anything free, or any other form of compensation to write this review. If the TV mount falls off my wall, or reveals any defects/drawbacks I overlooked, I’ll come back to update my review. But so far I’m super happy with my purchase and would recommend this to everyone else looking for a full motion TV wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install if you have done these before. No plastic cover for the metal base on the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect - Checks all the boxes
reviews.reviewText: The purchase price on this kit is really good for the content you receive. The hardware that comes with this is extensive and quite helpful. The mounting mechanism is extremely simple to install by yourself as long as you can lift your TV. I had this kit out of the box, attached to the wall and the TV, and fully installed by myself in about 20 minutes. It is very sturdy and well worth the purchase price. I chose to use Tapcon screws as this was installed directly to masonry in an outdoor mount. I would highly recommend this product - it is great quality for the price paid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mount. It's very sturdy, made with hefty steel. Easy installation right into the wall stud. Easy to pull towards or away from the wall. Fits my 32in 5yo old-tech LG flat screen. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was easy to install in a guest bedroom. Works great.
reviews.reviewText: Used this in a guest bedroom with a spare TV. Love the ease of installation and the flexibility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
